title: Pilates Studio, Recreational Areas, The Hair Loft
posting_body: ['Life at The Vantage is like nothing else in northeastern Ohio!', 'Our resort-like apartment community is ideally located a short drive from downtown Cleveland and just off I-271, making it getting around the Cleveland area easy.', 'Convenience is key at The Vantage, with Beachwood Place shopping mall located directly across the street and the Cleveland Clinic just minutes away.', 'Property Amenities:', 'Sauna and Whirlpool Spa', 'Recreational Areas', 'Swerve Grille', 'Pilates Studio', 'Gated Community with Controlled Access', 'Indoor and Outdoor Pool', 'Anthea Spa', 'The Hair Loft', 'Eyeware at The Vantage', 'Public Transportation Available', 'Clubhouse and Monthly Resident Events', 'Heated Underground Walkways', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
